org.eclipse.jetty.util.preventers

Class Java2DLeakPreventer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.eclipse.jetty.util.preventers.AbstractLeakPreventer
        • org.eclipse.jetty.util.preventers.Java2DLeakPreventer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifeCycle

    public class Java2DLeakPreventer
extends AbstractLeakPreventer
    Java2DLeakPreventer Prevent pinning of webapp classloader by pre-loading sun.java2d.Disposer class before webapp classloaders are created. See https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51687
